Jacob Habtemariam

Full Stack Web Developer from Reisterstown, Maryland. Completed the Full Stack Coding Bootcamp at Johns Hopkins University focused on the MERN Stack. I enjoy creating web applications and continue to learn more about Software Development every day.

Projects

Stovetop

JQuery based full stack application that allows users to create custom recipes. Recipes are stored in a MySQL database, which users can also use to query for and display recipes.

Off the Menu

Full stack React application that allows users with food allergies to search local restaurant menus in order to find foods that are safe for them to eat. User allergens ar stored in a database and displayed on their profile page. The application features a Mongo + Express backend that serves to a React UI.

Password Generator

This application allows the user to created a randomlly generated password with their choice of uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. The application also enforces a minimum password length of 8 characters.


Weather Application

Weather dashboard application built with React JS. This app allows the user to search the OpenWeather API for a city and display the city's current weather and 5 day forecast.

Note Taker

Simple CRUD application built with an Express JS backend. Allows users to create, save, and delete notes.

Day Planner

Day planner application that displays the current time and allows the user to enter and save events and todos. Provides the user with simple visual representation of their personal planner.
